contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Questions and Answers | Type = studio | Longtype = | Artist = [[The Sleeping]] | Cover = Questions&AnswersCOVER.jpg | Released = May 30, 2006 | Recorded = 2006 | Genre = [[Post-hardcore]], [[alternative rock]] | Length = 53:09 | Label = [[Victory Records|Victory]] | Producer = Mike Birnbaum; Chris Bittner | Last album = ''[[Believe What We Tell You]]<BR>(2004) | This album = '''''Questions & Answers'''''<BR>(2006) | Next album = ''[[What It Takes (album)|What It Takes]]''<BR>(2009) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{rating|3|5}} <ref>{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r834718|first=Rick|last=Anderson}}</ref> | rev2 = [[Emotionalpunk.com]] | rev2Score = {{rating|7|10}} <ref>[http://www.emotionalpunk.com/cdreview/435/ Emotionalpunk review]</ref> | rev3 = ''[[Hybrid Magazine|Hybrid]]'' | rev3Score = (positive) <ref>[http://www.hybridmagazine.com/reviews/0806/sleeping.shtml ''Hybrid Magazine'' review]</ref> | rev4 = [[Sputnikmusic]] | rev4Score = {{rating|3|5}} <ref>[http://www.sputnikmusic.com/album.php?albumid=9653 Sputnikmusic review]</ref> }} '''''Questions and Answers''''' is the second album by [[The Sleeping]], released May 30, 2006 through [[Victory Records]]. This album is a tribute to John "Beatz" Holohan (The late drummer to the band [[Bayside (band)|Bayside]]), as evidenced in the track, "Heart Beatz," and the lyrics in many of the songs; it is also a tribute to Caitlin Boyle, a beloved friend of The Sleeping, as stated in the liner notes. The song "Don't Hold Back" is featured in the video game [[Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock]], and is featured in the soundtrack of [[Madden NFL 07]]. Music videos were made for "Don't Hold Back" and "Loud and Clear." == Track listing == {{Track listing | title1 = Don't Hold Back | length1 = 4:34 | title2 = Loud and Clear | length2 = 3:52 | title3 = Heart Beatz | length3 = 4:04 | title4 = The Climb | length4 = 4:03 | title5 = The Big Breakdown Day 3 (The Escape) | length5 = 4:38 | title6 = King of Hearts | length6 = 4:25 | title7 = 3 Cigarettes | length7 = 3:34 | title8 = Who Stays Behind | length8 = 3:29 | title9 = Listen Close | length9 = 2:43 | title10 = Dearest Mistake | length10 = 4:45 | title11 = Better Than Anything Else | length11 = 4:35 | title12 = Still | length12 = 8:29 }} == Chart Position == {{Unreferenced section|date=August 2010}} {| class="wikitable" |- ! [[Top Heatseekers]] |- | align=center|25 |} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Questions And Answers}} [[Category:2006 albums]] [[Category:The Sleeping albums]]
